metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7061 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In PHP versions 7.3.x below 7.3.15 and 7.4.x below 7.4.3, while extracting PHAR files on Windows using phar extension, certain content inside PHAR file could lead to one-byte read past the allocated buffer. This could potentially lead to information disclosure or crash.

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
